description:
Bindings that suit race days and performance focused skiers. They clip manually to your boots so you can feel when they engage securely. Nice low profile gives you full contact for power transfer and exceptional feel for the terrain.

  • NNN-compatible Prolink composite guideridge is low profile so your boot sits closer to the ski for better snow feel
  • Ergonomic race lever with secure closure and easy-in, easy out wide opening
  • Flexor stiffness rating of 85
name: Salomon Prolink Pro Classic Bindings
